data.name: Grow Up! - A Worm Game
data.detailed_description:
Grow Up! - A Worm Game is about a worm-like creature from space, trying to find their way in the vast world, can you guide them and help them... Grow Up?

The Gameplay


  • Experience a truly unique form of character movement / control, requiring both mouse and keyboard.
  • This easy to learn, hard to master gameplay, will keep you coming back for more.
  • With 6+ Worlds, each filled with unique puzzles, gimmicks and challenges, your braincells will surely be stimulated!
  • Levels require light puzzle-solving, technical precision, and speed.
  • If you're fast enough, you could earn copper, silver or even gold medals, maybe something will happen if you earn enough?
  • Complete levels and earns medals to unlock customizations to pimp your worm.
  • With the high skill ceiling and a focus on speed, brag about your time achievements to other people!

data.short_description: Worms... WORMS! What are worms? Is this ~ a worm? Do worms really come from space? Only one way to find out! Get your hands ready for this challenging, perhaps tear inducing, humorous 2D precision speed game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
